props.name: src
props.docblock:
The src attribute of the image.
When it's not available, render initials instead.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the avatar.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The name used for the initials and title attribute.

props.name: hashValue
props.docblock:
The value used for the hash function.
The name is used as the hashValue by default.
When dealing with anonymous users you should use the id instead.

props.name: isSolid
props.docblock: When true, render a solid avatar.

props.name: color
props.docblock:
The color used for the avatar.
When the value is `automatic`, use the hash function to determine the color.

props.name: getInitials
props.docblock: Function to get the initials based on the name.

props.name: forceShowInitials
props.docblock:
When true, force show the initials.
This is useful in some cases when using Gravatar and transparent pngs.

props.name: sizeLimitOneCharacter
props.docblock: When the size is smaller than this number, use a single initial for the avatar.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The content of the alert. When a string is passed it is wrapped in a `<Text size={400} />` component.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the alert.

props.name: title
props.docblock: The title of the alert.

props.name: hasTrim
props.docblock: When true, show a border on the left matching the type.

props.name: hasIcon
props.docblock: When true, show a icon on the left matching the type,

props.name: isRemoveable
props.docblock: When true, show a remove icon button.

props.name: onRemove
props.docblock: Function called when the remove button is clicked.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the alert.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The content of the alert.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the alert. This should always be set explicitly.

props.name: hasIcon
props.docblock:
When true, show a icon on the left matching the type.
There is no point not showing this.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the Text.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: color
props.docblock:
The color used for the avatar.
When the value is `automatic`, use the hash function to determine the color.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: title
props.docblock:
This prop can be either a string or a Node.
It will provide a title for the items

props.name: items
props.docblock: An array of items to be used as options for the select

props.name: selectedItem
props.docblock: The selected Item to be shown on the autocomplete

props.name: defaultSelectedItem
props.docblock: The selected item to be selected & shown by default on the autocomplete

props.name: itemToString
props.docblock:
In case the array of items is not an array of strings,
this function is used on each item to return the string that will be shown on the filter

props.name: children
props.docblock: Function that will render the 'filter' component.

props.name: itemSize
props.docblock:
The height of each item in the list
Because the list is virtualized this is required beforehand.

props.name: renderItem
props.docblock: Function that returns a component to render the item

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position of the Popover the Autocomplete is rendered in.

props.name: itemsFilter
props.docblock:
A function that is used to filter the items.
It should return a subset of the initial items.
By default the "fuzzaldrin-plus" package is used.

props.name: isFilterDisabled
props.docblock:
Prop that enables and disables filtering
True: Enables Filtering
False: Disables Filtering

props.name: popoverMinWidth
props.docblock: Defines the minimum height the results container will be

props.name: popoverMaxHeight
props.docblock: Defines the maximum height the results container will be

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute of the checkbox.

props.name: name
props.docblock: The id attribute of the radio.

props.name: label
props.docblock: Label of the checkbox.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value attribute of the radio.

props.name: checked
props.docblock: The checked attribute of the radio.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when state changes.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the radio is disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock:
When true, the aria-invalid attribute is true.
Used for accessibility.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock:
The appearance of the checkbox.
The default theme only comes with a default style.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Children can be a string, node or a function accepting `({ close })`.
When passing a string, <Paragraph size={400} color="muted" /> is used to wrap the string.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the CornerDialog. Used for the button.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the dialog is shown.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the Dialog. Titles should use Title Case.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: hasFooter
props.docblock: When true, the footer with the cancel and confirm button is shown.

props.name: onConfirm
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the confirm button is clicked.
This does not close the Dialog. A close function will be passed
as a paramater you can use to close the dialog.

`onConfirm={(close) => close()}`

props.name: confirmLabel
props.docblock: Label of the confirm button.

props.name: hasCancel
props.docblock: When true, the cancel button is shown.

props.name: onCancel
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the cancel button is clicked.
This closes the Dialog by default.

`onCancel={(close) => close()}`

props.name: cancelLabel
props.docblock: Label of the cancel button.

props.name: width
props.docblock: Width of the Dialog.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Props that are passed to the dialog container.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the button.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the button.

props.name: isLoading
props.docblock:
When true, show a loading spinner before the children.
This also disables the button.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock:
Forcefully set the active state of a button.
Useful in conjuction with a Popover.

props.name: iconBefore
props.docblock: Sets an icon before the text. Can be any icon from Evergreen.

props.name: iconAfter
props.docblock: Sets an icon after the text. Can be any icon from Evergreen.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock:
When true, the button is disabled.
isLoading also sets the button to disabled.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock:
Forcefully set the active state of a button.
Useful in conjuction with a Popover.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock:
When true, the button is disabled.
isLoading also sets the button to disabled.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
Name of a Blueprint UI icon, or an icon element, to render.
This prop is required because it determines the content of the component, but it can
be explicitly set to falsy values to render nothing.

- If `null` or `undefined` or `false`, this component will render nothing.
- If given an `IconName` (a string literal union of all icon names),
  that icon will be rendered as an `<svg>` with `<path>` tags.
- If given a `JSX.Element`, that element will be rendered and _all other props on this component are ignored._
  This type is supported to simplify usage of this component in other Blueprint components.
  As a consumer, you should never use `<Icon icon={<element />}` directly; simply render `<element />` instead.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
Name of a Blueprint UI icon, or an icon element, to render.
This prop is required because it determines the content of the component, but it can
be explicitly set to falsy values to render nothing.

- If `null` or `undefined` or `false`, this component will render nothing.
- If given an `IconName` (a string literal union of all icon names),
  that icon will be rendered as an `<svg>` with `<path>` tags.
- If given a `JSX.Element`, that element will be rendered and _all other props on this component are ignored._
  This type is supported to simplify usage of this component in other Blueprint components.
  As a consumer, you should never use `<Icon icon={<element />}` directly; simply render `<element />` instead.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the button.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the button.

props.name: isActive
props.docblock:
Forcefully set the active state of a button.
Useful in conjuction with a Popover.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock:
When true, the button is disabled.
isLoading also sets the button to disabled.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: items
props.docblock: The options to show in the menu.

props.name: selectedItem
props.docblock: The selected item when controlled.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when value changes.

props.name: openOnFocus
props.docblock: When true, open the autocomplete on focus.

props.name: defaultSelectedItem
props.docblock: Default selected item when uncontrolled.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: The placeholder text when there is no value present.

props.name: itemToString
props.docblock:
In case the array of items is not an array of strings,
this function is used on each item to return the string that will be shown on the filter

props.name: inputProps
props.docblock: Properties forwarded to the input. Use with caution.

props.name: buttonProps
props.docblock: Properties forwarded to the button. Use with caution.

props.name: autocompleteProps
props.docblock: Properties forwarded to the autocomplete component. Use with caution.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Children can be a string, node or a function accepting `({ close })`.
When passing a string, <Paragraph /> is used to wrap the string.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the Dialog. Used for the button.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the dialog is shown.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the Dialog. Titles should use Title Case.

props.name: hasHeader
props.docblock: When true, the header with the title and close icon button is shown.

props.name: hasFooter
props.docblock: When true, the footer with the cancel and confirm button is shown.

props.name: hasCancel
props.docblock: When true, the cancel button is shown.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: onConfirm
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the confirm button is clicked.
This does not close the Dialog. A close function will be passed
as a paramater you can use to close the dialog.

`onConfirm={(close) => close()}`

props.name: confirmLabel
props.docblock: Label of the confirm button.

props.name: isConfirmLoading
props.docblock: When true, the confirm button is set to loading.

props.name: isConfirmDisabled
props.docblock: When true, the confirm button is set to disabled.

props.name: onCancel
props.docblock:
Function that will be called when the cancel button is clicked.
This closes the Dialog by default.

`onCancel={(close) => close()}`

props.name: cancelLabel
props.docblock: Label of the cancel button.

props.name: width
props.docblock: Width of the Dialog.

props.name: topOffset
props.docblock:
The space above the dialog.
This offset is also used at the bottom when there is not enough space
available on screen â€” and the dialog scrolls internally.

props.name: minHeightContent
props.docblock:
The min height of the body content.
Makes it less weird when only showing little content.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Props that are passed to the dialog container.

props.name: color
props.docblock: Color of icon. Equivalent to setting CSS `fill` property.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
Name of a Blueprint UI icon, or an icon element, to render.
This prop is required because it determines the content of the component, but it can
be explicitly set to falsy values to render nothing.

- If `null` or `undefined` or `false`, this component will render nothing.
- If given an `IconName` (a string literal union of all icon names),
  that icon will be rendered as an `<svg>` with `<path>` tags.
- If given a `JSX.Element`, that element will be rendered and _all other props on this component are ignored._
  This type is supported to simplify usage of this component in other Blueprint components.
  As a consumer, you should never use `<Icon icon={<element />}` directly; simply render `<element />` instead.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the icon, in pixels.
Blueprint contains 16px and 20px SVG icon images,
and chooses the appropriate resolution based on this prop.

props.name: title
props.docblock:
Description string.
Browsers usually render this as a tooltip on hover, whereas screen
readers will use it for aural feedback.
By default, this is set to the icon's name for accessibility.

props.name: style
props.docblock: CSS style properties.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: background
props.docblock:
Background property.
`tint1`, `tint2` etc. from `theme.colors.background` are available.

props.name: elevation
props.docblock:
Elevation of the Pane.
Values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

props.name: hoverElevation
props.docblock:
Elevation of the Pane on hover. Might get deprecated.
Values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

props.name: activeElevation
props.docblock:
Elevation of the Pane on click. Might get deprecated.
Values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.

props.name: border
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, muted, default.

props.name: borderTop
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: borderRight
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: borderBottom
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: borderLeft
props.docblock:
Can be a explicit border value or a boolean.
Values: true, extraMuted, muted, default.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used above the input element.

props.name: labelFor
props.docblock: Passed on the label as a htmlFor prop.

props.name: isRequired
props.docblock: Wether or not show a asterix after the label.

props.name: description
props.docblock: A optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: hint
props.docblock: A optional hint under the input element.

props.name: validationMessage
props.docblock:
If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint.

props.name: isAstrixShown
props.docblock: Wether or not tho show an asterix after the label.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
The contents of the validation message.
This is wrapped in a paragraph, use a string.

props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.docblock:
Element type to use for the menu item.
For example: `<MenuItem is={ReactRouterLink}>...</MenuItem>`

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: icon
props.docblock: The icon before the label.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The children of the component.

props.name: secondaryText
props.docblock: Secondary text shown on the right.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The default theme only supports one default appearance.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the menu item.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: id
props.docblock: The id attribute of the menu option.

props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: isSelected
props.docblock: The icon before the label.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The children of the component.

props.name: secondaryText
props.docblock: Secondary text shown on the right.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The default theme only supports one default appearance.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: title
props.docblock: Title of the menu group.

props.name: selected
props.docblock: The current value of the option group.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when selection changes.

props.name: options
props.docblock: List of options rendered in the group.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Children can be a node or a function accepting `close: func`
and `state: ENTERING | ENTERED | EXITING | EXITED`.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: Show the component; triggers the enter or exit states.

props.name: containerProps
props.docblock: Props to be passed through on the inner Box.

props.name: onExit
props.docblock:
Callback fired before the "exiting" status is applied.
type: `Function(node: HtmlElement) -> void`

props.name: onExiting
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "exiting" status is applied.
type: `Function(node: HtmlElement) -> void`

props.name: onExited
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "exited" status is applied.
type: `Function(exitState: Any?, node: HtmlElement) -> void`

props.name: onEnter
props.docblock:
Callback fired before the "entering" status is applied.
An extra parameter isAppearing is supplied to indicate if the enter stage
is occurring on the initial mount.

type: `Function(node: HtmlElement, isAppearing: bool) -> void`

props.name: onEntering
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "entering" status is applied.
An extra parameter isAppearing is supplied to indicate if the enter stage
is occurring on the initial mount.

type: `Function(node: HtmlElement, isAppearing: bool) -> void`

props.name: onEntered
props.docblock:
Callback fired after the "entered" status is applied.
An extra parameter isAppearing is supplied to indicate if the enter stage
is occurring on the initial mount.

type: `Function(node: HtmlElement, isAppearing: bool) -> void`

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position the Popover is on. Smart positioning might override this.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, the Popover is manually shown.

props.name: content
props.docblock: The content of the Popover.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
The target button of the Popover.
When a function the following arguments are passed:
({ toggle: Function -> Void, getRef: Function -> Ref, isShown: Bool })

props.name: display
props.docblock: The display property passed to the Popover card.

props.name: minWidth
props.docblock: The min width of the Popover card.

props.name: minHeight
props.docblock: The min height of the Popover card.

props.name: statelessProps
props.docblock: Properties passed through to the Popover card.

props.name: animationDuration
props.docblock: Duration of the animation.

props.name: onOpen
props.docblock: Function called when the Popover opens.

props.name: onClose
props.docblock: Function fired when Popover closes.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: bringFocusInside
props.docblock: When true, bring focus inside of the Popover on open.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The content of the Popover.

props.name: position
props.docblock:
The position the element that is being positioned is on.
Smart positioning might override this.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When true, show the element being positioned.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Function that returns the element being positioned.

props.name: innerRef
props.docblock: Function that returns the ref of the element being positioned.

props.name: bodyOffset
props.docblock: The minimum distance from the body to the element being positioned.

props.name: targetOffset
props.docblock: The minimum distance from the target to the element being positioned.

props.name: target
props.docblock:
Function that should return a node for the target.
({ getRef: () -> Ref, isShown: Bool }) -> React Node

props.name: initialScale
props.docblock: Initial scale of the element being positioned.

props.name: animationDuration
props.docblock: Duration of the animation.

props.name: onCloseComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the exit transition is complete.

props.name: onOpenComplete
props.docblock: Function that will be called when the enter transition is complete.

props.docblock: Wether or not show a asterix after the label.

props.docblock: A optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: validationMessage

If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint.

props.docblock: The width of the input width.

The options to show in the menu.
[{ label: String, value: String | Number, labelInList?: String }]

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called when an option is selected.

props.name: onDeselect
props.docblock: Function that is called when an option is deselected.

props.docblock: The selected value/values.

props.name: isMultiSelect
props.docblock: When true, multi select is accounted for.

props.name: hasTitle
props.docblock: When true, show the title.

props.name: hasFilter
props.docblock: When true, show the filter.

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position of the Select Menu.

props.name: detailView
props.docblock:
Can be a function that returns a node, or a node itself, that is
rendered on the right side of the Select Menu to give additional
information when an option is selected.

props.name: isMultiSelect
props.docblock: When true, multi select is accounted for.

props.name: detailView
props.docblock: Node that is placed right next to the options.

props.name: children
props.docblock:
Function that takes the current z-index and returns a React Node.
(zIndex) => ReactNode.

props.name: value
props.docblock: Set the value of the stack. This will increment for children.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the spinner.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function triggered when tab is selected.

props.name: isSelected
props.docblock: When true, the tab is selected.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock:
The appearance of the tab.
The default theme only comes with a default style.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the cell can't be edited.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Optional placeholder when children is falsy.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size used for the TextTableCell and Textarea.

props.name: children
props.docblock: This is the value of the cell.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Function called when value changes. (value: string) => void.

props.name: value
props.docblock: Used as the defaultValue of the textarea.

props.name: zIndex
props.docblock: The z-index placed on the element.

props.name: getTargetRef
props.docblock:
Function to get the target ref of the parent.
Used to mirror the position.

props.name: minWidth
props.docblock:
Min width of the textarea.
The textarea can never be smaller than the cell.

props.name: minHeight
props.docblock:
Min height of the textarea.
The textarea can never be smaller than the cell.

props.name: onBlur
props.docblock: Called when the textarea is blurred, pass the value back to the cell.

props.name: size
props.docblock: Text size of the textarea.

props.name: handleScrollbarSize
props.docblock: Returns the size of the scrollbar by creating a hidden fixed div.

props.name: value
props.docblock: The value of the input.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Handler to be called when the input changes.

props.name: autoFocus
props.docblock: Sets whether the component should be automatically focused on component render.

props.name: spellCheck
props.docblock: Sets whether to apply spell checking to the content.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Text to display in the input if the input is empty.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: When true, the cell can't be edited.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: Optional placeholder when children is falsy.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size used for the TextTableCell and Textarea.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the table row. Default theme only support default.

props.name: rightView
props.docblock:
Optional node to be placed on the right side of the table cell.
Useful for icons and icon buttons.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the table cell.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the table head.

props.name: accountForScrollbar
props.docblock:
This should always be true if you are using TableHead together with a TableBody.
Because TableBody has `overflowY: scroll` by default.

props.name: height
props.docblock: The height of the row. Remember to add paddings when using "auto".

props.name: onSelect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: onDeselect
props.docblock: Function that is called on click and enter/space keypress.

props.name: isSelectable
props.docblock: Makes the TableRow selectable.

props.name: isSelected
props.docblock: Makes the TableRow selected.

props.name: isHighlighted
props.docblock: Manually set the TableRow to be highlighted.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The intent of the alert.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the table row. Default theme only support default.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the table row.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Children needs to be an array of a single node.

props.name: defaultHeight
props.docblock:
Default height of each row.
48 is the default height of a TableRow.

props.name: allowAutoHeight
props.docblock:
When true, support `height="auto"` on children being rendered.
This is somewhat of an expirmental feature.

props.name: overscanCount
props.docblock: The overscanCount property passed to react-tiny-virtual-list.

props.name: estimatedItemSize
props.docblock:
When passed, this is used as the `estimatedItemSize` in react-tiny-virtual-list.
Only when `allowAutoHeight` and`useAverageAutoHeightEstimation` are false.

props.name: useAverageAutoHeightEstimation
props.docblock:
When allowAutoHeight is true and this prop is true, the estimated height
will be computed based on the average height of auto height rows.

props.name: isNumber
props.docblock: Adds textAlign: right and fontFamily: mono.

props.name: textProps
props.docblock: Pass additional props to the Text component.

props.name: textProps
props.docblock: Pass additional props to the Text component.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Makes the input element required.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Makes the input element disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: Sets visual styling to be invalid.

props.name: spellCheck
props.docblock: Use the native spell check functionality of the browser.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: The placeholder text when there is no value present.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the TextInput.

props.name: width
props.docblock: The width of the TextInput.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: label
props.docblock: The label used above the input element.

props.name: labelFor
props.docblock: Passed on the label as a htmlFor prop.

props.name: isRequired
props.docblock: Wether or not show a asterix after the label.

props.name: description
props.docblock: A optional description of the field under the label, above the input element.

props.name: hint
props.docblock: A optional hint under the input element.

props.name: validationMessage
props.docblock:
If a validation message is passed it is shown under the input element
and above the hint.

props.name: inputHeight
props.docblock: The height of the input element.

props.name: inputWidth
props.docblock: The width of the input width.

props.name: required
props.docblock: Makes the textarea element required.

props.name: disabled
props.docblock: Makes the textarea element disabled.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: Sets visual styling to be invalid.

props.name: spellCheck
props.docblock: Use the native spell check functionality of the browser.

props.name: placeholder
props.docblock: The placeholder text when there is no value present.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the TextInput.

props.name: width
props.docblock: The width of the TextInput.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the tooltip.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the tooltip.

props.name: position
props.docblock: The position the Popover is on.

props.name: content
props.docblock: The content of the Popover.

props.name: hideDelay
props.docblock: Time in ms before hiding the Tooltip.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When True, manually show the Tooltip.

props.name: children
props.docblock: The target button of the Tooltip.

props.name: statelessProps
props.docblock: Properties passed through to the Tooltip.

props.name: zIndex
props.docblock: The z-index of the toast.

props.name: duration
props.docblock: Duration of the toast.

props.name: onRemove
props.docblock: Function called when the toast is all the way closed.

props.name: intent
props.docblock: The type of the alert.

props.name: title
props.docblock: The title of the alert.

props.name: children
props.docblock: Description of the alert.

props.name: hasCloseButton
props.docblock: When true, show a close icon button inside of the toast.

props.name: isShown
props.docblock: When false, will close the Toast and call onRemove when finished.

props.name: bindNotify
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.notify` function.

props.name: bindGetToasts
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.getToasts` function.

props.name: bindCloseAll
props.docblock: Function called with the `this.closeAll` function.

props.name: appearance
props.docblock: The appearance of the code.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the button.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: size
props.docblock: The size of the heading.

props.name: marginTop
props.docblock: Pass `default` to use the default margin top for that size.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
When passed, adds a icon before the list item.
See Evergreen `Icon` for documentation.

props.name: iconColor
props.docblock: The color of the icon.

props.name: rel
props.docblock:
This attribute names a relationship of the linked document to the current document.
Common use case is: rel="noopener noreferrer".

props.name: href
props.docblock: Specifies the URL of the linked resource. A URL might be absolute or relative.

props.name: target
props.docblock: Target atrribute, common use case is target="_blank."

props.name: color
props.docblock: The color (and styling) of the Link. Can be default, blue, green or neutral.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: className
props.docblock:
Class name passed to the link.
Only use if you know what you are doing.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text used in a list item.
Can be: 300, 400, 500, 600.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text style.
Can be: 300, 400, 500.

props.name: fontFamily
props.docblock:
Font family.
Can be: `ui`, `display` or `mono` or a custom font family.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text style.
Can be: 300, 400, 500, 600.

props.name: fontFamily
props.docblock:
Font family.
Can be: `ui`, `display` or `mono` or a custom font family.

props.name: theme
props.docblock: Theme provided by ThemeProvider.

props.name: size
props.docblock:
Size of the text used in a list item.
Can be: 300, 400, 500, 600.

props.name: icon
props.docblock:
When passed, adds a icon before each list item in the list
You can override this on a individual list item.

props.name: iconColor
props.docblock: The color of the icon in each list item in the list.
